description.value:
Requirements You're in Rushing Goat Stance.

You rush into your enemies with great and reckless force. You Climb, Stride, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap], then make a ramming horn Strike. On a success, the target of the Strike is pushed up to 10 feet directly away from you. On a critical success, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
